全消去[おしゃべりポップアップ]
全消去[おしゃべりポップアップ]
Hm? Did I drink too much...? I can see my naked wife...
(Doubt we could even talk properly like this...)
What is it, miss? Need something from us? We no longer make
I knew it! This wonderful aroma is steamed ale, right?!
Oh? You sound like you know a thing or two. Here's a drink on
Puah♪ It's been a whole month since I had some steamed ale.
You really chugged that one down. Damn it, now you're making
me think about my wife again.
Your wife? Let me guess... She ran away?
How'd you know...? No, it doesn't matter. After seeing you drink,
I'd like to ask you a favor.
Please be the mother for my son!
Bfft...!! Cough, cough!! Wh-What are you even saying?!
He's still at the age where he needs a mother's love. Please!
You don't even have to be here everyday.
Okay, fine, let's do this. You said you're an engineer, right?
There's an unused Era Furnace over there. If you find any usable
parts, you're free to take as many of them as you want.
As many as I want...? Does that mean you're done making
That's the gist of it. Anyway, give it some thought. You don't
have to give me an answer right away.
Talk to Gletcher directly to progress the request.
Miss, it's too early for you to meet my son looking like that.
The stimulation would be too strong.
(Doubt we could even talk properly like this...)
How about it? Feeling up to it now?
I can't come every day, but I can at least chat with him... But
first things first, can I take a look at the Era Furnace?
Yeah, be my guest. You can even take some parts back with you
(Substituting for someone's mother is too much responsibility
Don't be afraid to ask if
Actually, about that, I don't need any. In return, can you start
I'll return the question. It's pretty obvious you were using it with
a lot of care. What's the real reason why you're closing the
It's just... I started this place with my wife, you see. She was an
excellent engineer, and on top of that, a real beauty.
But ever since she ran away... whenever I start making alcohol,
she comes to mind and... ugh... sniff...
Jeez, what am I going to do with you? You're such a coward
Shut up, leave me alone. You wouldn't understand my pain, miss.
Besides, if there isn't an engineer to maintain it, I can't make
Jeez... I can't replace your wife, but you do know there's an
engineer in front of you, right?
I'll pick up where she left off and handle the maintenance and
repairs for your Era Furnace. Of course, that's only for as long
No... But it'd be such a waste to see it turn into scrap, that's all.
No buts. That's my condition for looking after your son. If you
can't agree to it, then we can pretend this conversation never
F-Fine... If that's what you want, I'll do my best to give it
Oh, also... my last condition is that you let me drink the alcohol
here as much as I want.
And so, Erina accepted his request as a member of the Gletcher
呼び出し[おしゃべりポップアップ]

parameters.arg1: Now then, let's go say |hi to his son.

parameters: 顔グラフィックを表示するアクターID = 1
メッセージ文字列 = Now then, let's go say |hi to his son.
It's only been a day, but you're both hitting it off pretty nicely.
You're welcome to stay the night if you want.
Let's see.... I guess I'll accept your offer.
You two better go get yourselves cleaned up first.
Ahaha... I did have him help me with the repairs on the Era
There's a nearby bathhouse we're on good terms with. The water
should've gotten replaced around now, so it's a good chance to
Oh, that sounds nice. Let's head on over.
Erina, you're basically part of the family now. You're free to
stay here for as long as you want.
Yo, looks like you're hitting it off with my son.
Of course. So, I was hoping you could do me a favor...
What else do you want me to do to him?
No, no, I've got nothing more to ask for him. But it's been
a while for me since my wife away, too.
ちゃんと避妊してくれるなら、まぁ……いいけど。
へへ……じゃ、夜になったら来てくれ。鍵は開けとくからよ。
昼間はカロの勉強の邪魔になっちまうからな。
夜になったら来てくれ。鍵は開けとくからよ。
昼間はカロの勉強の邪魔になっちまうからな。
呼び出し[おしゃべりポップアップ]
顔グラフィックを表示するアクターID = 1
メッセージ文字列 = Isn't this place...?
I knew it... This is in better condition than the ones I saw when
I arrived here. It's been maintained properly, too...
Alright, I made up my mind.
I better do my best, too.
Oh, it's you. What happened? Caro came back alone and locked
I talked about my mistake at the bath while thinking about how
he might rescind his reward for this request.
Wahaha! What, is that it? Well, I figured that was going to
happen after seeing you two go to the bath.
I'm sorry. I thought for sure he hadn't grown up to that point
No, no, if anything, go make him a man. I'm pretty sure he
hasn't shot his first load yet. It's a good opportunity.
If he stays a late bloomer, he's going to stay single for the rest
of his life in this city. The earlier he can experience a woman,
Wait, wait!! That's a little extreme...!
Nothing wrong with helping a boy fire his first shot, right?
Either way, take responsibility for subjecting him to your boobs.
Not a fan of how you said that, but it's true that I do feel
responsible... Fine, I'll do it for his sake.
Either way, take responsibility for subjecting him to your boobs.
Not a fan of how you said that, but it's true that I do feel
responsible... Fine, I'll do it for his sake.
How was that? You learn better by tinkering with actual
machines than just reading a book, right?
Hey... Do you think you can stop calling me teacher? It's kind
of hard to relax when you do.
But... what should I call you then...?
Well... Anything besides teacher is fine... Call me whatever you'd
Then, can I call you... onee-chan?
Sure. So, that means you're my little brother starting today,
No need to be so rigid. Let's just take it easy like actual siblings.
Ye—O-Okay, got it... I-Is this fine?
Fufu. Well, I guess you won't be able to do it right away, but we
can get used to it as we go, okay?
Okay, let's wrap up for today.
U-Umm, well... if your father says I can stay the night, then...

parameters.arg1: Dang... It's amazing how|pure kids his age are.

parameters: 顔グラフィックを表示するアクターID = 1
メッセージ文字列 = Dang... It's amazing how|pure kids his age are.
Papa says he wants to talk
Onee-chan, stay the night today! Please?
Mmm... I do have things I need to take care of.
(And I'm sure he's going to "beg" me to do things...)
Stay the night at the Gletcher's house?
So, how'd last night go? Swell?
Well, I guess it worked out...
I see, I see. Well, we'll be in your care from now on.
▼各種ステータス上昇値を清算
You do not need to report this quest.
さてと、そろそろ寝ましょうか。
何かを言いたげにしている……
何かあったらおねえちゃんに相談して、って言ったでしょ。
よほど言い出しにくいことらしい。
おねえちゃんにまたシコシコして欲しい。
（なるほど、確かにそれは言い出しにくいわよね……）
それに比べて採掘ギルドの男たちときたら……
これくらいの慎ましさを持って欲しいわね。
じゃあ、おねえちゃんとまたシコシコしよっか。
……カロと何事もなく一晩過ごした。
ひょっとして、またシコシコして欲しい？
ふふっ、おねえちゃんにシコシコされるの
だって、すごく気持ちよくて……
じゃあ……今日は別のコトで気持ちよくさせてあげようかしら。
じゃ、早速始めるとするか。
俺の部屋でしてもいいが、エリナは声がデカそうだからな。
カロを起こしちまうかも。
あ、でもその前に約束通り避妊はしてよね。
へいへい。わかってますよ。
悪いが避妊具はエリナの方で用意してくれよ。
はぁ、しょうがないわね。
グレッチャーとセックスするにはアイテム「避妊具」を
所持している必要があります。
Onee-chan, stay the night today! Please?
Mmm... I do have things I need to take care of.
(And I'm sure he's going to "beg" me to do things...)
Stay the night at the Gletcher's house?
